channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Minnesota gears up for anti-immigration enforcement protest Friday despite dangerous cold
item.description: A vast network of labor unions, progressive organizations and clergy has been asking Minnesotans to stay away from work, school and stores Friday to protest against immigration enforcement in the state.

item.title: Immigrants often donâ€™t open the door to ICE, but that may no longer stop officers
Texas and Oklahoma brace for snow and ice as winter storm barrels toward eastern two-thirds of US
